```{r}

library(readr)
library(here) 
library(rio) 
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr) 
library(ggplot2)


#| warning: false  

star <- import(here("Data","star.csv"))  

star %>%   
  group_by(sex,frl) %>%  
  summarise(mean(tmathss), sd(tmathss),   
            mean(treadss), sd(treadss)) %>%  
  kable(col.names = c("sex","frl","math_mean", "math_sd",                       "rdg_mean", "rdg_sd"), 
        digits = 3,booktabs = TRUE) 
```
